title: How to Open Pistachios with a Coin

steps.headline: Grip a single pistachio between your thumb and your curled index finger.
Turn the shell so that you can easily insert a thin metal coin into the gap between the two halves of the shell.
Choose a clean coin that will fit into the gap of the shell.
steps.description: If necessary, sanitize the coin as you would any other utensil that will come into contact with your food.

steps.headline: Insert the coin into the gap between the two halves of the shell.
Twist the coin as a lever to separate the two halves of the shell.

text: Grip a single pistachio between your thumb and your curled index finger.  Turn the shell so that you can easily insert a thin metal coin into the gap between the two halves of the shell.  Choose a clean coin that will fit into the gap of the shell. If necessary, sanitize the coin as you would any other utensil that will come into contact with your food. Insert the coin into the gap between the two halves of the shell.  Twist the coin as a lever to separate the two halves of the shell. Enjoy your liberated pistachio kernel.
